title: Palsy
description: The character's hands shake involuntarily.
effect: -10 to Agility tests involving fine motor control.

title: Dark-hearted
description: The character grows cruel and callous.
effect: -10 to Fellowship tests when trying to appear sympathetic.

title: Ill-fortuned
description: The character is cursed with terrible luck.
effect: Reduce Fate Points by 1 (minimum 0).

title: Skin Affliction
description: Hideous boils, rashes, or weeping sores cover the body.
effect: -10 to Fellowship tests involving appearance.

title: Night Terrors
description: Horrific nightmares plague the character's rest.
effect: Must pass WP test each morning or gain 1 Fatigue.

title: Fell Obsession
description: The character becomes fixated on a dark topic.
effect: -10 to all Perception tests (distracted by obsession).

title: Irrational Nausea
description: A specific common stimulus triggers uncontrollable nausea.
effect: WP test when exposed or Stunned for 1 round.

title: Wasted Frame
description: The character's body wastes away despite eating.
effect: -5 Toughness bonus for resisting disease.

title: Baleful Eye
description: One eye becomes milky and disturbing.
effect: -5 to BS tests. Disturbing appearance.

title: Cursed Luck
description: Mechanical devices frequently malfunction around the character.
effect: Tech-Use tests within 5m suffer -10.

title: Morbid Fascination
description: The character is drawn to scenes of death and suffering.
effect: WP test to leave a scene of carnage voluntarily.

title: Witch-mark
description: A visible brand or mark of corruption appears on the body.
effect: Easily identified as tainted. Social penalties in Imperial society.

title: Ashen Taste
description: All food tastes of ash and decay.
effect: No mechanical effect, but deeply unsettling.

title: Bloodlust
description: The character craves violence.
effect: WP test or must attack nearest enemy in melee when combat begins.

title: Unnatural Taint
description: Animals react with fear and hostility.
effect: Animals flee or attack within 10m. Survival tests at -20.

title: Warp Echo
description: The character's reflection shows something monstrous.
effect: Fear (1) test for anyone who sees the reflection.

title: Fell Addiction
description: The character becomes addicted to a harmful substance or practice.
effect: Must indulge daily or suffer -10 to all tests.

title: Blackouts
description: The character suffers periodic blackouts lasting minutes to hours.
effect: GM may impose blackouts at dramatic moments.

title: Corpse-like Pallor
description: The character's skin becomes deathly pale and cold.
effect: -5 Fellowship. Easily mistaken for undead.

title: Mutation
description: A visible mutation manifests â€” extra fingers, vestigial limb, or worse.
effect: Visible mutation. Automatic execution if discovered by authorities.
